alert.note: Alert for East Carroll; Madison; Tensas; West Carroll (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 5:11AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of East Carroll, north central Tensas, Madison and southern West Carroll Parishes, Warren, Issaquena and southwestern Sharkey Counties through 600 AM CST... At 511 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bakers, or 16 miles west of Tallulah, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Waverly around 515 AM CST. Tendal around 520 AM CST. Tallulah around 525 AM CST. Omega, Sondheimer and Mansford around 530 AM CST. Alsatia around 535 AM CST. Eagle Bend around 540 AM CST. Valley Park and Onward around 550 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mayersville, Delta, Pioneer, Mound, Forest, Cary, Richmond and Epps. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Carroll; Madison; Tensas; West Carroll
